name: Scortalo in the 316th Dimension
description:
Scortalo, a young Glitchrean, explores the world of a dimension he helped to save.

Now, this game does get dark. It touches topics that hit close to home for me. Read the warnings and decide if you want to delve into this. Also, while this is not a straight up horror game, I really don't plan it to be, I still wanted to label it as such because of the topics explored, of torture, death, suicide, depression, anxiety, PTSD, sadly rape, murder, war, mafia, and apocalypse.

I'm going to try to have humorous moments, because I don't want to be all down. Yeah, there are dark topics, but there's stuff that I listed that I refuse to depict visually, nor even describe in text. Yes, Scortalo went through horrible stuff, but even I have a pretty big limit of comfort describing it. Like, it's mentioned in the game, but I will not describe it or show it in the game, if that makes sense. At least the really, really disturbing stuff.

You know how art can help the artist cope with their life. Yeah, this is what this is for me.
